description:
Anne invites Diana to tea, but a mix-up with bottles could make it their last meeting as friends.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Czy można być długo smutnym na tak ciekawym świecie?
Konna Omoshiroi Sekai de, Itsumademo Kanashin ja Irarenai wa
One Can`t Stay Sad Very Long in Such an Interesting World
こんなおもしろい世界で, いつまでも悲しんじゃいられないわ
